question: I am one in China, two in Indonesia, three in the Philippines, none in Japan. What am I?
I live on land but in a tree. What am I
I have three eyes but cannot see. What am I?
Two handsome racers are having a race. One keeps lapping the other and the race never ends. What am I?
I jump when I walk and sit when I stand. What am I?
I am an insect. Half of my name is another insect. What am I?
How many bricks does it take to finish a brick building?
I’m rarely touched but often held and if you’re wise you’ll use me well. What am I?
I can't go right, i can't go left. I'm forever stuck going only up and down. What am I?
When I point up, it’s bright. When I point down, it’s dark. What am I?
I wave my hands at you, But I never say goodbye. You’re always cool with me, Even cooler when I’m high. What am I?
A necessity to some, a treasure to many, I’m best enjoyed among pleasant company. Some like me hot, some like me cold. Some prefer mild, some like me bold.
I have been hot my entire life. Put me in water or in a freezer for days and I will still be hot. My red color should tell you but don’t be deceived, even when I’m green, I’m still hot. What am I?
I am a rare case where today comes before yesterday. What am I?
What breaks on the water but never on land?
There are 125 sheep and 5 dogs in a flock. How old is the shepherd?
What’s nowhere but everywhere except where something is?
What goes in the water red and comes out black?
I make you see the beauty of nature through colors, My name makes things weigh less and I have no weight at all. What am I?
Moving to and fro, Dancing all the time. Only to be moved by others to allow them to pass by.
You can swallow me, but I can swallow you. What am I?
What asks but never answers?
My first three letters stores things. Not many people understand me. What am I?
If you lose me, others around you may lose me too. What am I?
I grow in trees, eat living things but have no teeth and give birth to something that looks nothing like me. What am I?
I have three letters. Cut one off and I become stronger. Cut two off and I become ten. What am I?
I have two hands but I cannot clap. What am I?
Anyone can take it as long as it’s on someone.
I’m something you might eat, but I also kill. Small children play with me and parents don’t mind. What am I
What has feet but no legs?
I used to be the light of your life, i’d keep you warm while I cried, now I’m forgotten and tossed away. What am I?
What day will you never see again?
What is the center of gravity?
Sometimes I’m a sphere, sometimes I’m a banana, and sometimes I’m not there at all. What am I?
Shorter than my four siblings, but easily the strongest. Who am I?
I’m so simple I only point, yet I guide people all over the world. What am I?
What can you catch but not throw?
What runs around the yard without moving?
What has teeth but can’t bite?
Look in my face and I am someone, look in my back I am no one. What am I?
What 11-letter word does everyone pronounce incorrectly?
What can split itself before splitting something else?
Right now everyone in the world, no matter where they are, is doing the exactly same thing. What is it?
What goes up and down but doesn’t move?
What is placed on the table, cut and passed but never eaten?
What is black when it’s clean and white when it’s dirty?
What is made of wood but can’t be sawed?
